course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Cornerstone Engineering Design Project Course
course.description: This course aims at providing students experiential learning experience through exposing students to knowledge and skills from different engineering disciplines. Students in this course will be divided into design teams. Each team will use the acquired knowledge and skills to design and build an engineering artifact. In order to account for students with different technical background, the technical components will be offered online and students would be engaged in experiential learning through working on team projects.
course.exclusions: ENGG 1100, ENGG 1200

reviews.author: Snow wolf
reviews.title: Good Course
reviews.comment_content:
Good Course
will teach you how to use Adriano, writing elec programs
slightly talk about CAD and Solidwork
reviews.comment_teaching:
Good Course
the TAs are quite good
the are caring and the other students are friendly
will join with other school's students
reviews.comment_grading:
remember to go more lab
I get first place in the competition
it is easy and funny
and lastly, I get a B+ as my grade
have fun if you enroll
reviews.comment_workload:
average
need do HKMOOC
quite a lot of things to do for HKMOOC
last summer is making a car
but making the car is quite funny
similar to elec 1100
